scripts.check-formatting: yarn prettier -c './**/*.cfg' './**/*.ini' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc ./.style.yapf && isort . --check && yapf -rd ppp_ps2.py .stubs test
scripts.format: yarn prettier -w './**/*.cfg' './**/*.ini' './**/*.md' './**/*.toml' './**/*.yml' ./.prettierrc ./.style.yapf && isort . && yapf -ri ppp_ps2.py test
scripts.install-python-deps: python -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip install poetry && poetry install && pip install -e . && pip install mypy pylint pylint-quotes pytest pytest-cov coveralls pytest-mock types-requests toml yapf
scripts.qa: yarn mypy && yarn pylint && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
